attributes.review:
This app was terrible! Would NOT recommend downloading!!!! After logging in, all of my information was stolen. >:( this is very angering. 
I would like to quote the following (thank you daveed diggs): “Donald Trump is a white supremacist. FULL STOP ✋ if you vote for him again you’re a white supremacist.”

attributes.title: THIS IS A DISGRACE TO HUMANITY
attributes.review: I can’t believe I actually decided to download this app and I’m never opening it again. It crashes CONSTANTLY and it took DAYS to download. I got it so I could get news and alerts about stuff and even with my notifications on, I don’t get any!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP ITS NOT EVEN WORTH THE CLICK

attributes.title: Why is it still here
attributes.review: It took a whole WEEK to download and when it finally downloaded it was just blank not loading I gave it some time and still wouldn’t load there’s a big or smh

attributes.title: Horrible😌🧚🏼
attributes.review: This app has little to no functionality and I was very disappointed to see what was decided to be put on this app. For a president who’s so good with social media you would think he’d do better. Disappointed.

attributes.title: The Annoying Orange is at it again
attributes.review: Stop thinking in a two party system and start thinking like a person. We should be able to agree that trump isn’t doing a good job and isn’t a good person.

attributes.title: ✨🏳️‍🌈✨🌸🧚🏽🧚🏽‍♂️🌼✨🌼
attributes.review: Even though I look like I BURNT chicken nugget I still love my self. This app is just not it. It makes me hate myself. Anyways this app requires for you to put your email and I totally forgot mine out of nowhere so this was annoying. I will love to talk to the manager NOW!

attributes.title: Literal trash.
attributes.review: This app up SO much storage which mama don’t have that much left. it took 4 hours to download only to find out that it was FULL of criminals pictures. honestly i’m very disappointed. it was a waste of my time and storage.

attributes.title: This app promised to cure my corona virus 🐍🤢
attributes.review: I am very disappointed and baffled why someone would blatantly lie about curing my corona virus. The app took 4 days to download, it was glitchy. My Siri started speaking Arabic out of nowhere. It tried building a wall one night. I do not advise downloading this app.

attributes.title: Absolutely horrifying 😱
attributes.review: Right off the bat, asked me for my phone number, like please, at least try to start conversation. Plus, I’m underage. I understand you like them younger Mr. President but please, at least try to curb your urges with the entire public watching.🤢🤢🤢

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP HE WILL HACK YOUR PHONE
attributes.review: When I download his app on my 📱phone started acting😡 stupid I want to my settings and I seen👁👄👁2 devices  I was like um 😠my phone should be the only device to my phone I got mad and deleted his dumb app 🤮then my phone stop acting stupid it was his dumb app ⚠️DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP⚠️ he will ⚠️HACK YOUR PHONE⚠️
